name: Planet Attack
description:
Planet Attack is a small buggy game made in the Beginners Circle Game Jam. This if the first finished product I have made. I've learned a lot through this game jam (coding, asset creation and implementation) I have also discovered an unknown passion for Photoshop. 

Thank you for the friendly community. Thank you for the help I've received. Thank you to the host of this game jam!

Game Notes:

- Controls are shown in game

-If the pause menu doesn't show up when the player has died, press escape twice

- Sometimes the pause menu doesn't show up. Double tap the escape key

- If cursor disappears, navigate to another level where the cursor will reactivate

- Custom cursor only shows up on the Forest Planet
